introduction: This section is designed to help you strengthen your knowledge of React Native and mobile app development. You’ll start with the fundamentals—learning about components, JSX, and basic styling to build simple UIs. As you progress, you’ll dive into state management, props, and navigation, understanding how to create interactive and dynamic app experiences. Finally, in the advanced topics, you’ll tackle animations, performance optimization, and integrating native modules, gaining the skills to build high-quality, production-ready apps.
